duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with customers in a personalized way to ensure a genuine and unique experience for each customer.
Support a selling environment in all areas of the sales floor by connecting with multiple customers and providing product suggestions.
Utilize technology to provide a frictionless customer experience by transacting in the moment and finding sizes, colors, and placing orders for items not available in-store.
Build productive relationships with peers, ask for support when needed, and make an effort to help others.
Participate in the learning and sharing of product knowledge, current trends, and personal styling priorities to inspire the customer.
Support the shipment process, understand the contribution to service and selling on every shift, and maintain Anthropologie’s visual and operational standards.
Maintain stock levels of the floor, stay current on merchandising updates, and contribute to completion of omni order fulfillment processes.
Contribute to a positive team morale, participate in store initiatives, and communicate feedback to Store Leadership.
Work flexible hours to meet the needs of the store, including nights, weekends, and holidays.

education_certification.credential: Experience in customer service and being a team player. Ability to work flexible hours to meet the needs of the store, including nights, weekends, and holidays.
